methods.description: Adds numbers training data to the model

methods.description: Adds a text training data to the model

methods.description: Gets the status of the model

name: ML4KComponent
helpString: This provides an interface for the Machine Learning for Kids website.

events.description: Event indicating that a classification got an error.
